sentences.cn: 小子, 你仔细看看你做的好事!

sentences.en: Don't squirt me with your squirt gun!
sentences.cn: 不要用你的水枪射我啦!

sentences.en: Here's his heaven: " Dude , you can like, squirt people and not get detention! "
sentences.cn: 学校是他的天堂: “ 小少爷可以为所欲为, 喷射别人,并且不受处罚! ”

sentences.en: It is illegal to buy , sell or possess a squirt gun.
sentences.cn: 买卖或持有玩具水枪是违法的.

sentences.en: It just needs a little squirt of oil.
Keep an eye on the water though - don't let It'squirt out of the pipes!
sentences.cn: 要密切注意,不要让水从管子中喷溅出来!

sentences.en: Norman cut open his pie and squirted tomato sauce into it.
sentences.cn: 诺曼切开他的馅饼，往里面挤了番茄酱。

sentences.en: OK, Squirt here will give you a rundown of proper exiting technique.
sentences.cn: 好了, 小虎还会在这里给你们讲解一下正确的起跳技巧.

sentences.en: On the right hand is assuredly that'squirt'Val Dartie.
sentences.cn: 右边男的也同样肯定是那个“瘪三”法尔·达尔第.

sentences.en: Some kids squirted a water pistol in her face.
sentences.cn: 有几个小孩用水枪朝她脸上喷水。

sentences.en: Test the altitude of gun 、 firing range and water amount of fire fighting squirt and water cannon.
sentences.cn: 试验消防水枪及水炮的射高、射程及水量.

sentences.en: The human heart creates enough pressure when it pumps out to squirt blood 30 feet.
sentences.cn: 人类心脏的压力可以将血液打到30尺高的地方?

sentences.en: The snake can squirt poison from a distance of a metre.
sentences.cn: 这种蛇能把毒液喷射到一米处远。

sentences.en: Then he squirt a small amount of medication to the side and back of his mouth.
sentences.cn: 然后他向口腔的侧面和后面挤压小量药液.

sentences.en: You squirt foam out of a nozzle and direct it at the base of the fire.
sentences.cn: 你对着火的基底部分,把泡沫从管嘴喷出来.

trans.tran_cn: 喷，细的喷流，注射器，傲慢无礼的年轻人，喷气式飞机
trans.tran_en: a fast thin stream of liquid
if you squirt liquid or if it squirts somewhere, it is forced out in a thin fast stream
